title: Ankle-length cheongsam with brown netted fabric

physical_appearance:This is an ankle-length cheongsam that is long-sleeved. There is a collar present as well. There are no visible tears on the exterior of the cheongsam. There are light green and brown floral motifs appearing all over the cheongsam. The piping of the cheongsam runs from the collar to its left side
 just below the point where its left sleeve begins.There is a slit present on the right side of the cheongsam.
subject_terms_1:dresses (garments) womenswear floral patterns allover patterns
subject_terms_2:Qipao Ethnic costume Women\u0027s clothing Motifs
subject_terms_3:Ethnic costume Chinese costume
sgcool_label_text:This is an ankle-length cheongsam with long sleeves
 with light green and brown floral motifs with gold thread. The sleeves of the cheongsam are tapered at the ends and could be secured by snap buttons
 to emphasise the slender arms of the wearer
